Classes/TGMapData.html.name: TGMapData
Classes/TGMapData.html.abstract: A TGMapData is a convenience class to display point, polygons or polylines from a dynamic data layer.

Classes/TGMapViewController.html.name: TGMapViewController
Classes/TGMapViewController.html.abstract: TGMapViewController is a flexible and customizable map view managing the lifecycle of a

Classes/TGMarker.html.abstract: Marker interface that makes you able to add icons, polylines and polygons to the map view.

Classes/TGMarkerPickResult.html.name: TGMarkerPickResult
Classes/TGMarkerPickResult.html.abstract: Data structure holding the result of a marker selection that occured on the map view.

Classes/TGSceneUpdate.html.name: TGSceneUpdate
Classes/TGSceneUpdate.html.abstract: Represents a data structure to specify a YAML path and the corresponding value for a Tangram scene update.

Type Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
